alert.note: Alert for Coastal Dixie; Coastal Taylor; Inland Dixie; Inland Taylor; Lafayette (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 22 at 11:26AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Lafayette, northwestern Dixie and southeastern Taylor Counties through NOON EDT... At 1125 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 15 miles south of Perry to 13 miles west of Steinhatchee to 27 miles west of Horseshoe Point. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Steinhatchee, Tennille, Fish Creek, Cooks Hammock, Jug Island, Howell Place, Clara, Carbur, Jena, Adams Beach, Dekle Beach, Hines, Jonesboro, Jack Lee Island, Keaton Beach, Bird Island, Salem, Blue Springs, San Pedro Junction and Cedar Island. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Dixie; Coastal Taylor; Inland Dixie; Inland Taylor; Lafayette
